scene.title: 虎の咆哮
scene.text: The night wind blows, and the silver moon rises high.
Illuminated by the moonlight, a single shadow formed. The second silhouette overlapped on top of it in an even more flickering candle flame
The shadow twisted, changing into various shapes. It looked very comical to me
Meanwhile, the shadow masters didn’t budge an inch.

The girl readies herself as if she's holding a sword in her left hand, then clenches it with the right. This is 「Zangetsu」—the first stance of Edge of Taixuan-gata (The Void Blade).[\s]And she’d decided that the first attack would be Type 6 「Taruenjuusan」 of Li Family「Uen Shuanggui」.
The girl stood tall boldly, enjoying her first official other-style match in life.

text.p: The flickering candlelight illuminated a young girl in the darkness of night, making her look much larger than she actually was.
Meanwhile, the man in front of him was leaning forward faintly and bending his back—his legs; both arms.[\s]
This stance is 「Tiger Howl Qixiao」, a secret technique passed down through the Katou Luo clan.

scene.text: If someone from the martial arts world were here, they would have wondered why a leader of Golden Sand Society was learning Katomon school’s Martial Arts.[\s]However, a girl who knew next to nothing about the martial arts world had no way of knowing that

mono.p: The man and the girl stood facing each other, probing at one another without moving an inch.
Tonight's moonlit silence enveloped the small courtyard.
Would this kind of silence always befall the East before duels?
They were both looking for an opening in their opponent.
However, the third person was somewhat numb.

scene.text: That person is playing with a small cross in his hand.
scene.dialog: 「It would still take some time for me to understand.」

cg.img: 氛围_通用_犹大誓约启动

scene.text: He tossed his cross into the air, watching it disappear like mist.
—At the same time, a girl suddenly launched an attack.
After facing it for so long, "Eagle" finally showed an opening.
The opening was only for a moment. His breathing had become just slightly ragged

text.p: In that moment, Majic's movements stagnated and Koku lost his stance.

scene.text: Li Sushang didn't miss her chance and leaped forward!
—Her fists are like the wind, her palms of lightning!

text.p: The sound of a slap rang out.

motion.img: 老鹰-惊讶-受伤擦血-中景

scene.text: "Eagle" staggers and takes a step back. Blood flows from her mouth
He spat several times. The salty, bitter liquid slammed into the stone floor along with his shattered teeth

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰血李普通2

scene.dialog: 「This is my first slap, after all.」
scene.text: The girl smiled as she spoke.
scene.dialog: 「I'll return the second shot, so be careful.」

mono.p: "Eagle" couldn't calm her anger.
The girl had slapped him just as he’d made the mistake of moving his mind and lost consciousness for a moment.
Though he hadn’t suffered much damage, this blunder left him feeling ashamed.
However, it seems that Li Sushang has not gone all out yet.
This gives me more confidence in 「Variable」. At the same time, it doubles my sense of humiliation
He hadn't used 「Koko Isao」 in a long time. It was my first use of it since I last saw him, but he still seemed to be rusty after all[\s]
The enemy was not an opponent he could afford to let his guard down and win. He would never make the same mistake again

cg.img: CG_第一折_鹰李对峙_鹰血李飞

scene.text: Sushang used 「Surprise Tsubame Futsuren」 again and vanished in the blink of an eye.

text.p: The two of them unleashed three techniques in midair.
Their power was equal, and neither side had the upper hand.

scene.text: The girl landed gracefully, then unleashed 「Keiken Zangetsu」 again.

mono.p: The roar of the tiger surprised Tsubame as she flew.[\s]
The Hedong Luo family's Hufeng Jiuxiao has long been famous for its bravery
The Type 13 Suien was light and varied, each with their own strengths.[\s]
However, the girl who should have been winning in terms of raw power was barely evenly matched against "Eagle".
This itself was an unbelievable stump.
"Eagle" won the bet.
Ever since the battle began, Li Sushang had been unable to use her true feelings.
The reason she continued to take the form of Taixuankeiken after her family tradition, Tarien Jusanshiki...
That was exactly what she wanted to confirm.
（That medicine shouldn't be working on me...）
In terms of her inner strength, 「Taixuan」 at the Jizaimon gate was probably number one in all Japan.
Each faction in Shinshu has their own unique way of thinking. However, even though the formalities have changed and its essence remains unchanged—it all comes down to training
If one were to compare Majic with water, a normal Uchiko would be like training the vessel for putting it in and increasing its capacity.[\s]
Not only do I have to undergo harsh training, but my improvement is also extremely slow. And above all else there's a risk of putting too much strain on the human body
On the other hand, 「Taixuan」 is fundamentally different from all others.[\s]
「Blade Mantra」 trains not「Vessel」, 「Sandou」 but percentA.
It absorbs the true power from all things in heaven and earth, allowing its internal merit to flow freely within itself like a stream of water.
This new method was created by Phoenix, the founder of Taixuanichimyaku.
It was deep and mysterious, but there were also very large restrictions.

For example, if a man were to train his Edge of Taixuan (Void Blade), the majority of them would be discouraged midway through their training and wouldn't get any better. It was impossible for anyone other than an exceptionally talented young boy to learn such feats as he did
On the other hand, if a woman trains her Taixuan (Vengeance of Wisdom), she can achieve great results with little effort.
Even someone with ordinary talent could obtain enough strength to beat a man in handiwork.
Master Sushang was said to be the strongest swordsman in history, and if it were just for her inner merit alone she would have been unbeatable by anyone else on Earth.
The girl she had taught him also possessed extraordinary skills.

scene.text: But right now, it's a situation where the meritocracy is sealed----

motion.img: 老鹰-惊讶-肉搏百裂拳-中景

scene.text: Heavy fists came at the girl in rapid succession.
Thanks to her extraordinary reflexes and intuition, Li Sushang had avoided each one of "Eagle"’s attacks—and blocked them as well.

dialog.p: But even so, I'm the one who wins.）

scene.text: The members of the Golden Sand Society who had fought so far only swung their weapons around with brute force, but "Eagle" was different. This man knew not just how to use his fists; he also used seriousness and strength in a way that strengthened one's knuckles—he clearly possessed extraordinary Uchiko skills

text.p: But even if she couldn’t use her true self, the girl still had an absolute advantage.
The strength of the body that had trained her swordsmanship was far greater than a normal person.
And sword form is the most profound martial art in this world.

scene.text: 「Shuken: Taruyanagi」!

text.p: The large man unleashed a fist heavy as rain, but Li Sushang was barely able to block it with just the form of her set sword.

scene.text: But even so, Kokoku's fists continue to attack without rest. It feels like the raging waves are constantly beating against her as she slowly takes a step back from where I am holding my sword with one hand and overpowering his steel punches in other words...
scene.dialog: （Hey... Don't you know how tired this falcon is?）

text.p: The leader of the Golden Sand Society didn’t seem tired at all.
Even as the girl stretched out like a willow, her fist was blocked with all its might...
She didn’t let up on her attack for a moment.

scene.text: The shadow of a flood-like fist rushed at Li Sushang.
Now that he had no internal strength to protect his body, taking this heavy blow would easily break him like a dead branch.
scene.dialog: （No, there was no opening in the shape of a defensive sword.）
scene.text: Such thoughts grazed Li Sushang’s head, but they didn't make a ripple and were quickly erased.

dialog.p: （I've seen through most of his punches. The Type-Six sword can handle them well enough to dodge any blows that might come my way...
...Still, if she's wasting this much of her power like that... it should naturally weaken.）

text.p: There was no way "Eagle" wouldn’t understand such simple logic.[\s]
But why would he continue his onslaught as usual?

scene.text: Under the restriction of losing his inner merit, Li Sushang was hesitant to carelessly lay a hand on him
As she waited for her chance,[\s]I waited for an opening.
